sentences: Mark Snow (born Martin Fulterman; August 26, 1946) is an American composer for film and television.
Among his most famous compositions is the theme music for science fiction television series The X-Files.
The theme reached no. 2 on the UK Singles Chart.
Snow also wrote the music for another Chris Carter series, Millennium, and the background music scores for both shows, a total of 12 seasons.
Interview with Randall D. Larson, Soundtrax: Episode 2008-11, 23 May 2008
